idea-plugin.name: Dodona
idea-plugin.vendor: Pieter De Clercq and Tobiah Lissens
idea-plugin.description: This plugin makes it possible to submit your exercises to Dodona right from within your favourite JetBrains IDE.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• [BUGFIX] Issue #41 is fixed; When no file had an active focus, submitting was not possible. This is now resolved and the currently active opened file is submitted.
  • [IMPROVEMENT] The authentication flow has been rewritten from scratch and is now more interactive, providing a better user experience.
  • [IMPROVEMENT] Instructions on how to configure the plugin have been rewritten.
  • [IMPROVEMENT] Settings have been rewritten to allow a more secure storage of the API token.
  • [IMPROVEMENT] Clicking "More details" upon submitting an incorrect solution now shows the feedback instead of the exercise.

action.description: Submits the current file to Dodona.
